item.title: Secured blog using Let's Encrypt
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: I finally did it! I joined the secure web. Thanks to Let’s Encrypt and Caddy, this blog is now served via HTTPS. Caddy makes using Let’s Encrypt a single line change in a config file. It could not get simpler than that. Here is how I converted from static hosting on Amazon’s S3 to a Digital Ocean instance running Caddy in a Docker container.
